name: Cherry_Chairside_Chest
reviews: While well made, this side table/chest is a very red color and does not look at all like the picture. I was very disappointed but didn't want tosend it back. Be careful with Butler Furniture items.

I needed a small table to fit between two recliners. Everything I viewed on-line looked cheap or wasn't the style I wanted. Then I came across this table. It is perfect! It is a little darker than pictured, but that was perfect for me. It fit in with the other furniture in the room. It is a sturdy piece of furniture that I will enjoy for many years to come. Another good value for the price.
description:
Add this beautifully finished cherry chairside chest to your sitting room or reading nook for a touch of style that is also functional. The simple yet elegant design works well with traditional or contemporary design choices, and the chest offers plentiful storage for your favorite board games, books or electronics.
Spacious storage for board games or electronic gamesFits perfectly next to recliner or sofaElegant, yet simple lines complement contemporary or traditional room settingPull out shelf ideal for beverages, phone or remoteFinish: Plantation cherryMaterials: Poplar wood solids, wood products, cherry veneers and antique brass finished hardwareSet includes: One (1) chairside tableDimensions: 24 inches high x 12 inches wide x 24 inches deepStyleContemporaryMaterialWoodTypeSide TablesFinishCherry FinishChair TypeReclinersShapeRectangle, RoundAssemblyAssembledFurniture Frame MaterialWoodFurniture PatternSolid
